name: Shoot Gun BLAST!!!
description:
You found yourself captured and trapped in an unknown testing facility. Only walls as the eyes can see and a strange gun at your hand, that so impractical that it shot only blast shots in front of you. 

Use your wits and your platforming skill to SHOOT GUN BLAST!!! your way and escape this strange facility!

Left-click to BLAST!!! to push yourself in the opposite direction.

Hold Right-click to Slowdown time! Has a limited meter until time returns to normal.

Just die? Press "R" to retry! Try and try and TRY AGAIN!!!

Good luck test subjects! Clear the 4 challenges and see you when you escape! 

Disclaimer: This game was made for academic study, for a Digital game design class.
I do not own any music and background pictures inside the game and was added for studying purposes and the game feels.
